Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2001...
Injured on 4/28/2002 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/19/2002 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/16/2003, off Cliff Lee (DET)...
Injured on 5/17/2003 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 8/30/2005...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/18/2005...
Hit for the cycle against Kansas City on 6/13/2006...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2006...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Colorado on 6/4/2007 (Going to TB: C J. Arencibia, CF C. Rasmus, SS Y. Escobar. Going to COL: 3B D. Wright, 1B T. Hafner)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2007, hitting .378 with 8 HR, 23 RBI...
Injured on 8/22/2007 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/2008, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2008 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Cincinnati, driving in 7 runs on 9/9/2008...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/2008, hitting .458 with 6 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2008, hitting .337 with 12 HR, 33 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Los Angeles (N), driving in 6 runs on 5/6/2009...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2009, hitting .333 with 11 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 2009 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2009, hitting .394 with 11 HR, 28 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (N), driving in 4 runs on 8/26/2009...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 4/24/2010...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Arizona on 6/9/2010...

Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/2011, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 4/15/2012...

Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Houston, driving in 3 runs on 8/20/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/2012, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Sets a new season NL-Record for HR with 56 on 9/24/2012...
Sets a new season NL-Record for RBI with 165 on 9/30/2012...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2012, hitting .268 with 15 HR, 39 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/2012, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...

Had 2000th career hit on 8/22/2015, off Roy Oswalt (PHI)...

Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 7/22/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/27/2016, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2016...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against San Diego on 8/6/2017...
Injured on 9/23/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Colorado to Arizona on 1/31/2019 (Going to COL: 2B W. Bergolla, RF A. Cifonte, CF D. Stubbs, P J. Hirsch. Going to ARI: 3B D. Wright)...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Had 600th career homerun on 5/24/2020, off Wallace Lade (SDN)...
Released by Arizona on 8/14/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 8/14/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $972,222 per year...
Had 3000th career hit on 9/2/2022, off Brian Cuevas (SEA)...
